forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The day begins in Downtown San Francisco with a refreshing clarity that hints at the golden embrace of late morning sunshine. As the clock creeps toward noon, a gentle but persistent breeze from the west-southwest is weaving its way through the urban canyons, presenting a brisk backdrop, occasionally gusting to stir the gossamer clouds that hover just beyond the horizon. Yet, in this hour, the shadows of the iconic structures flicker beneath a mostly sunny veil, with temperatures hovering coolly around the low 60s, assuring one that light layers will serve well through the day.

As afternoon approaches, expect the veil to thicken slightly, with clouds rolling in to soften the edges of the sun. The air will carry a whisper of the ocean, signaling a gradual return to the cozy embrace of evening as the temperature drifts toward the mid-50s. Dressed in light layers—a stylish cardigan or a light jacket paired with comfortable trousers—one will be perfectly attired to navigate the city's inviting avenues. The warmth of a café patio beckons, ideal for sipping a rich brew or perhaps a crisp, refreshing beverage while gazing at the serene, if somewhat obscured, views of the Bay. The day is decidedly pleasant—an invitation to embrace the beauty of San Francisco's summer dynamic, allowing each discovery to unfold leisurely in this vibrant urban landscape.
